blogPost.excerpt: A single place to store your customer feedback, manage it and act upon it! Try out our new feedback widget to catch customer feedback right inside your app!
blogPost.body: A single place to store your customer feedback, manage it and act upon it! Try out our new feedback widget to catch customer feedback right inside your app!
blogPost.title: ProdCamp Feedback Widget - Nail your customer feedback
blogPost.author: Anton Zorin

localize.description: 一个单一的地方来存储您的客户反馈，管理它并根据它采取行动! 试试我们新的反馈小工具，在您的应用程序中收集客户反馈意见!
一個單一的地方來存儲您的客戶反饋，管理它並根據它採取行動! 試試我們新的反饋小工具，在您的應用程序中收集客戶反饋意見!

previous.excerpt: A web app that uses spaced repetition, a sophisticated learning algorithm, and a tree-structured note-taking tool. Think Workflowy and Anki combined. It also brings together various learning theories and tricks.
previous.title: LearnObit - A cognitive tool to boost learning

localize.description: 一款使用间隔重复、复杂的学习算法和树状结构的记事工具的网络应用。想想Workflowy和Anki的结合。它还汇集了各种学习理论和技巧。
一款使用間隔重複、複雜的學習算法和樹狀結構的記事工具的網絡應用。想想Workflowy和Anki的結合。它還彙集了各種學習理論和技巧。
